activities:
On our website, we collect information from our clients, partners and prospective clients for the purposes of supporting current customers and marketing to prospective customers.  We do not sell; rent our share any contact information collected.

Our Software As A Service (SaaS) applications also enable our customers to capture of information for their sales, marketing and business use.  Organizations using our products will be collecting and storing customer, prospect and partner contact and other information with our applications.   Our Terms of Use expressly forbids sending unsolicited commercial email and/or violating local laws while using our products. 
 
We take great care in securing and protecting any personal information gathered by us or our by our customers using our products.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization and Customer and Prospect Data
recoursemech: Private sector developed dispute resolution mechanisms that incorporate the Safe Harbor framework - TRUSTe EU SH Program
